testcase.classname: Verify the functionality of flight search on emirates.com
testcase.name: User should be able to search the flight
testcase.system-out: Given that the user is on Emirates.com......................................passed When the user enters the "DXB" and "LHR" destinations and journey as one way.passed And user selects the flying dates...........................................passed And clicks on the search flights button.....................................passed Then Flight Search Screen is displayed......................................passed And the browser is closed...................................................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the functionality of flight search on emirates.com
testcase.name: User should be able to search the flight 2
testcase.system-out: Given that the user is on Emirates.com......................................passed When the user enters the "DEL" and "DXB" destinations and journey as one way.passed And user selects the flying dates...........................................passed And clicks on the search flights button.....................................passed Then Flight Search Screen is displayed......................................passed And the browser is closed...................................................passed
